targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1), top5 AS (SELECT CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.holdings') h ORDER BY weight_pct DESC LIMIT 5) SELECT SUM(weight_pct) AS value FROM top5;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1), top5 AS (SELECT CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.holdings') h ORDER BY weight_pct DESC LIMIT 5) SELECT SUM(weight_pct) AS value FROM top5;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.holdings') j ORDER BY weight_pct DESC LIMIT 10;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.holdings') j ORDER BY weight_pct DESC LIMIT 10;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.market_value') AS REAL) AS market_value, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.current_yield_pct') AS REAL) AS current_yield_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL) AS projected_monthly_dividend, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.unrealized_pct') AS REAL) AS unrealized_pct FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.holdings') j ORDER BY market_value DESC LIMIT 10;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.market_value') AS REAL) AS market_value, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.current_yield_pct') AS REAL) AS current_yield_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL) AS projected_monthly_dividend, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.unrealized_pct') AS REAL) AS unrealized_pct FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.holdings') j ORDER BY market_value DESC LIMIT 10;
